item.title: Model-Predictive Control
item.description: Vehicle model linearization Vehicle model is $$ \dot{x} = vcos(\phi)$$ $$ \dot{y} = vsin((\phi)$$ $$ \dot{v} = a$$ $$ \dot{\phi} = \frac{vtan(\delta)}{L}$$ State and Input vector: $$ z = [x, y, v,\phi] $$ $$u = [a, \delta]$$ x: x-position; y:y-position; v:velocity; φ: yaw angle; a: accellation; δ: steering angle ODE is $$ \dot{z} =\frac{\partial }{\partial z} z = f(z, u) = A’z+B’u$$ where $$ \begin{matrix} 1 & 2 & 3 \ 4 & 5 & 6 \ 7 & 8 & 9 \ \end{matrix} $$
